channel.title: Rscpk!
channel.description:
Another server from Hikilaka, [b]RSCPK[/b] is [b]RSCAngel[/b] based!
[b]Features:[/b] [ul][li]Experience rate is 120x (doubled in wilderness)[/li] [li]Hosted on a Dedicated server[/li] [li]Tons of Events[/li] [li]Capture The Flag [RSCAngel][/li] [li]Lottery [RSCAngel][/li] [li]MySQL Objects AND NpcLocs(working on entire server being MySQL)[/li] [li][b]AND MORE![/b][/li][/ul]
[b]Commands:[/b] [ul][li]Staff[/li] [li]Online[/li] [li]Onlinelist[/li] [li]Edge[/li] [li]Stuck[/li] [li]Say[/li] [li]Fatigue[/li] [li]Wildy[/li] [li]Nearby[/li][/ul]
[b]Pictures:[/b] [img]http://rscpserver.no-ip.org/images/pic1.png[/img] [img]http://rscpserver.no-ip.org/images/pic2.png[/img] [img]http://rscpserver.no-ip.org/images/pic3.png[/img] [img]http://rscpserver.no-ip.org/images/pic4.png[/img] [img]http://rscpserver.no-ip.org/images/pic5.png[/img] [img]http://rscpserver.no-ip.org/images/pic6.png[/img]
Website for client and registration in signature..., :)
Special Thanks to KO9 for releasing RSCAngel source! <3!!!
